body: get_sentences_and_labels get_sentences_and_labels(path:str) -> Tuple[List[str], List[str], Set[str], Set[str]] Combines tokens into sentences and create vocab set for train data and labels. For simplicity tokens with 'O' entity are omitted. Args: path : Path to the downloaded dataset file. Returns: (sentences, labels, train_vocab, label_vocab)
title: get_sentences_and_labels
